title: Differential Equation: Cylindrical Coffee Pot part - b

content.question: Given that h = 17 at time t = 0, solve the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for h as a function of t.

frqParts.text: Given that h = 17 at time t = 0, solve the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for h as a function of t.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
